name: Rouge at Lupa - A sit-down Experience
description:
A sit-down dinner for all things rouge!

This Valentine’s Day, Lupa is bringing back old-school romance with “Rouge”. Sleeves to put your phones away, while you live in the moment. From truly romantic songs to a truly romantic dinner, with polaroids to capture the moment & questions to make your conversations last longer, we’ve got it all covered. A saxophonist to put you in just the right mood, a cocktail menu that’s made especially for V-Day, and lots more!
We’re very serious about all things love.

Book your table now!

name: Tea-led Bar Experience w/ Tell Camellia
description:
Tell Camellia (one of the best bars in Hong Kong) partners with Bunker Room to present an intimate tea cocktail experience.

Designed as a guided journey, this collaboration places tea at the centre of cocktail creation, storytelling, and service. The experience highlights Tell Camellia’s beverage philosophy, where tea is not an accent, but an essential ingredient and narrative driver.
Set within Bunker Room, the evening unfolds through thoughtful design and considered service, creating the perfect stage to bring this concept to life.
